snip.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: to cut something by making quick cuts with scissors
snip.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: I snipped the string and untied the parcel.
Snip the ends of the beans off before you cook them.
snip.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: a quick small cut with scissors
snip.translation[2].definitions[0].examp: At £20 for twelve, they’re a snip!
